Rising temperatures, melting ice caps , and extreme weather events are affecting millions of people worldwide. Scientists have been warning about these changes for decades, yet global action remains insufficient. We need immediate and comprehensive solutions including renewable energy adoption , sustainable transportation , and policy changes at all levels of government. The future of our planet depends on the actions we take today!
